attributes.action: Allow all exams to be conducted from home
attributes.additional_details: Allow this to go ahead and have all exams conducted from home as the country has already been doing this
attributes.background: Allow all exams be conducted from home this will bring a lot of students a sense of feeling calmer while doing there exams which already are a large pressure by allowing students to complete all exams from home gives them the best chance

rejection.details:
We understand you want students to be able to sit exams at home, however it is not clear which types of exams you are referring to, nor whether you are referring to school, college or university students.

In any case, the Government has confirmed that GCSE and A-level exams will not take place this year, with students' grades calculated by their teachers in line with guidance provided by the Government. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021.

If there is a specific change that you would like the Government to make to these exam arrangements, you could start a petition about that.

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here:  

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk 

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people   

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
